scripts.test:ci:force: npm run test:ci:safe || echo 'Unit tests failed but continuing...'
scripts.e2e:force: npm run e2e || echo 'E2E tests failed but continuing...'
scripts.test:all: npm run test:ci && npm run e2e
scripts.test:all:force: npm run test:ci:force && npm run e2e:force
scripts.reports:copy: powershell -Command "if (!(Test-Path '\\owen400\cnodevsrv\reports')) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path '\\owen400\cnodevsrv\reports' -Force }; if (!(Test-Path '\\owen400\cnodevsrv\reports\coverage')) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path '\\owen400\cnodevsrv\reports\coverage' -Force }; if (!(Test-Path '\\owen400\cnodevsrv\reports\cypress')) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path '\\owen400\cnodevsrv\reports\cypress' -Force }; if (!(Test-Path '\\owen400\cnodevsrv\reports\unit-tests')) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path '\\owen400\cnodevsrv\reports\unit-tests' -Force }; Copy-Item -Path 'coverage\*' -Destination '\\owen400\cnodevsrv\reports\coverage\' -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Copy-Item -Path 'cypress\reports\*' -Destination '\\owen400\cnodevsrv\reports\cypress\' -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Copy-Item -Path 'reports\unit-tests\*' -Destination '\\owen400\cnodevsrv\reports\unit-tests\' -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host 'All reports copied to dev server'"
scripts.deploy:copy: powershell -Command "if (!(Test-Path '\\owen400\cnodevsrv\dist')) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path '\\owen400\cnodevsrv\dist' -Force }; Copy-Item -Path 'dist\cobusiness-portal\*' -Destination '\\owen400\cnodevsrv\dist\' -Recurse -Force; Write-Host 'Application deployed to dev server'"
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build:dev && npm run test:all && npm run reports:copy && npm run deploy:copy
scripts.deploy:dev:force: npm run build:dev && npm run test:all:force && npm run reports:copy && npm run deploy:copy
scripts.deploy:dev:quick: npm run build:dev && npm run reports:copy && npm run deploy:copy
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build:prod && npm run test:all
scripts.deploy:prod:force: npm run build:prod && npm run test:all:force
